text.text:
<https://gcc2021.sched.com/event/ihox/emea-apac-session-5|Session 5> starts in 9 mins with the following super awesome talks:

- Analysis of Microscopy Data in Galaxy, Beatriz Serrano-Solano
- Bridging Natural Language Processing and Biomedical Data Analysis, Nancy Ide
- French EBV operationalization pilot, where Galaxy can help Biodiversity, Coline Royaux
- Updates from the Single-Cell Community, Wendi Bacon, Mehmet Tekman
- NanoGalaxy: Nanopore long-read sequencing data analysis in Galaxy, Willem de Koning
- Using custom Galaxy workflows to reproducibly search for bacteriophage spanin proteins reveals distinct population distributions, Jolene Ramsey

Captions for individual talks can be accessed with the [CC] icon on the video.
